article_title: Voices: Helping Clients Resolve Their Differences
article_text:
Cheryl Holland is the president and founder of Abacus Planning Group Inc. in Columbia, S.C. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community.

We negotiate all day long, with our team members and with clients, and we also listen to and help clients negotiate with each other. When helping clients negotiate, one of the best ways of facilitating a...

twitter.description: Financial advisers can use so-called interest-based negotiating to help couples address disagreements and shape a shared plan, this adviser says.
